content.question: The notation given is correct. Which of the following identifies a voice leading error in the performed example?

unit.text: 7: Harmony and Voice Leading IV - Secondary Function

topic.text: 7.4: Part Writing of Secondary Leading Tone Chords

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Apply knowledge of musical symbols and terms to detect discrepancies in pitch and rhythm when comparing notated and performed music in one or two voices.
